message.body: They're back!
In the words of my sister, we have out lives back.
*our
I'll carry you and tuck you in lol. Poof, she's out cold
Goodnight for now though.
I need to learn how to take the train or bus in one day.
Pull up Google maps on your phone then punch in an address. There are transit options and they'll advise you on how to go
I can go with you if you'd like. I have a monthly pass so it's no extra cost to ride around lol
That's so nice of you to offer. I'm actually going during the day though, don't you have work?
I do actually. Did you look at Google maps to get an idea of what routes to take?
Not yet. But I'll work out the logistics for tomorrow later.
Where's the sun???
Alright just let me know if you need help. Why the change in getting around? Job hunting?
It went down because we lost an hour.
I have a meeting. Want to avoid the time having to look for parking and traffic.
My sister said we're gaining a minute of sunlight every day.
It is raining though.
Lol well I'm not seeing these minutes!
Oh how fun. If it's in the city I'd like to get lunch with ya.
Wait where do you work?
Oh hi. I was just about to call. I work at broad and Samson
I remember you saying it's across from a newspaper building.
I'm just awesome like that.
Just kidding hahah.
Okay, I'm pretty bad at street names. I need landmarks.
Heh indeed. It's the wells Fargo building
I don't know where that is hahah! Not picturing it. How far are you from City Hall?
Oh wait, my meeting's at 9. I might be home before lunch...
ï¿¼Normally I would tell people to use their phones and Google it but...
Well I'm starting around 1030 tomorrow. Up to you if you'd like to do brunch. They're pretty lax about my schedule.
Lucky you! Hahahah thanks for the visual aid. Okay, I'll text you tomorrow after my meeting and I guess we'll play it by ear since we might be cutting it pretty close.
Do you get to start at 10:30 everyday cause that's pretty sweet!
No. We just started a different rotation to meet client contracts. It'll be every 3 weeks indefinitely when I start at 1030. However I will stay until 7 to fill out the shift.
Can I ask what the meeting is for? I'm just really curious
I'm meeting with a recruiter. No biggie. Not talking to the CIA or anything hahah.
I actually wouldn't mind that schedule. At least you'll miss traffic.
I don't mind really. It's just commuting by bus. It's better at rush hour because there are more buses you can catch. Although it can be crowded
I do miss biking to work though
You biked to work? Nice.
Oh well that's a trade-off. At least getting to sleep in a bit longer would make up for that.
I still wake up early because my body says so lolol
Speaking of which, I am so sleepy right now and I really shouldn't be. I think my sleep deprivation from the days few days have just compounded and caught up to me. Boo!
Oh you suck, rub it in!
Why don't you get some rest then? Do you need to study for tomorrow or something?
I still have to prep for it. Just feel so unprepared and so tired!
What preparation do you feel you're lacking in?
I can help if you want
Goodluck with tomorrow Phuong. I'm positive you'll be a rock
Ugh I just fell asleep.
Get much done?
